posts.title: My Hero Academia - Season 1
posts.description: In a world where 80% of humanity possesses 'Quirks,' Izuku Midoriya is born powerless but gains a chance to become a hero after a fated meeting with All Might.

posts.title: The Fantastic Four: First Steps
posts.description: Marvel's First Family enters the MCU. Set in a retro-futuristic 1960s, the team must balance their new powers with a cosmic threat.

posts.title: Jurassic World Rebirth
posts.description: A new era of the Jurassic franchise begins. Five years after the events of Dominion, a specialized team races to secure DNA samples from the world's most dangerous dinosaurs.

posts.title: Voldemort: Origins of the Heir
posts.description: While initially a fan project, HBO's upcoming Harry Potter reboot series has sparked renewed interest in the origins of Tom Riddle. This entry tracks the anticipated 2026 window for the Wizarding World's return.

posts.title: Superman
posts.description: Directed by James Gunn, this film follows Superman as he reconciles his heritage with his human upbringing. He is the embodiment of truth, justice, and a better tomorrow.

posts.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part Two
posts.description: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team embark on their most dangerous mission yet to track down a terrifying new weapon that threatens all of humanity.

posts.title: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
posts.description: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: he has burned through eight of his nine lives. Puss sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore his nine lives.

posts.title: Top Gun: Maverick
posts.description: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice.

posts.title: My Hero Academia - Season 2
posts.description: The UA students compete in the world-renowned Sports Festival. Later, Deku, Iida, and Todoroki face off against the fearsome Hero Killer: Stain.

posts.title: My Hero Academia - Season 3
posts.description: During a summer training camp, the League of Villains launches a surprise attack. This leads to the historic final battle between All Might and All For One.

posts.title: My Hero Academia - Season 4
posts.description: Deku takes on an internship with Sir Nighteye and joins a mission to rescue a young girl named Eri from the Yakuza leader, Overhaul.

posts.title: My Hero Academia - Season 5
posts.description: Class 1-A and Class 1-B battle in a joint training exercise. Meanwhile, the League of Villains faces off against the Meta Liberation Army.

posts.title: My Hero Academia - Season 6
posts.description: The Paranormal Liberation War begins. Heroes and Villains engage in an all-out war that will change hero society forever.

posts.title: My Hero Academia - Season 7
posts.description: The final war between Heroes and Villains begins as Star and Stripe arrives from the USA to face Shigaraki.

posts.title: My Hero Academia - Final Season
posts.description: The appearance of "quirks," newly discovered super powers, has been steadily increasing over the years, with 80 percent of humanity possessing various abilities from manipulation of elements to shapeshifting. This leaves the remainder of the world completely powerless, and Izuku Midoriya is one such individual.
posts.japaneseTitle: Boku no Hero Academia Final Season

posts.title: My Hero Academia: Two Heroes
posts.description: Deku and All Might visit I-Island to meet an old friend, but they find themselves trapped when a sophisticated security system is hacked by villains.

posts.title: My Hero Academia: Heroes Rising
posts.description: Class 1-A visits Nabu Island for a safety project, but their peaceful trip is cut short when they are attacked by a powerful villain named Nine.

posts.title: My Hero Academia: World Heroes' Mission
posts.description: When a cult releases a chemical that makes Quirks go out of control, the world's heroes must divide and conquer across the globe to stop them.

posts.title: My Hero Academia: You're Next
posts.description: In a society crumbling from war, a mysterious man resembling the former 'Symbol of Peace' appears, forcing Deku and Class 1-A into a new conflict.

posts.title: Jujutsu Kaisen - Season 1
posts.description: Yuji Itadori enters the world of Sorcerers after consuming a cursed finger of the demon Sukuna to save his friends.

posts.title: Jujutsu Kaisen 0
posts.description: A prequel following Yuta Okkotsu, a boy haunted by the powerful cursed spirit of his childhood friend.

posts.title: Jujutsu Kaisen - Season 2
posts.description: Yuji Itadori faces his darkest challenges yet during the devastating Shibuya Incident.

posts.title: Attack on Titan - Season 1
posts.description: After his hometown is destroyed and his mother is killed, young Eren Yeager vows to cleanse the earth of the giant humanoid Titans.

posts.title: Attack on Titan: No Regrets
posts.description: The prequel story of Captain Levi Ackerman, exploring his life in the underground city and his first encounter with Commander Erwin Smith.

posts.title: Attack on Titan - Season 2
posts.description: The battle continues as new types of Titans appear within the walls, and the true identities of the Colossal and Armored Titans are revealed.

posts.title: Attack on Titan - Season 3 Part 1
posts.description: The Survey Corps fights a civil war against the Royal Government to uncover the dark history of the Walls and the Reiss family.

posts.title: Attack on Titan - Season 3 Part 2
posts.description: The mission to retake Shiganshina begins. Humanity's final charge results in uncovering the truth hidden in Eren's basement.

posts.title: Attack on Titan - Final Season Part 1
posts.description: The war crosses the sea to Marley. As the cycle of hatred continues, the line between hero and villain becomes blurred.
posts.japaneseTitle: Shingeki no Kyojin: The Final Season

posts.title: Attack on Titan - Final Season Part 2
posts.description: Eren Yeager begins the Rumbling, unleashing thousands of Colossal Titans to flatten the world outside the island of Paradis.
posts.japaneseTitle: Shingeki no Kyojin: The Final Season Part 2

posts.title: Attack on Titan: The Final Chapters
posts.description: The cinematic conclusion to the series. The remaining Scouts and Warriors must stop Eren's Rumbling at all costs.

posts.title: Robin Hood
posts.description: A new reimagining of the legendary outlaw who steals from the rich to give to the poor, set against a gritty historical backdrop.

posts.title: Speed and Love
posts.description: A world-champion sport stacker struggles to maintain his relationship when his girlfriend of many years decides to end their partnership.

posts.title: Landman
posts.description: Set in the proverbial boomtowns of West Texas and a modern-day tale of fortune-seeking in the world of oil rigs, the series is an upstairs/downstairs story of roughnecks and wildcat billionaires that are fueling a boom so big it's reshaping our climate, our economy and our geopolitics.

posts.title: Frozen 3
posts.description: Anna and Elsa return for a third chapter in the record-breaking franchise. While plot details are under wraps, Disney has confirmed this as a major 2026 tentpole.

posts.title: Spirit
posts.description: A high-octane police procedural starring Prabhas and directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga. This is one of the most anticipated 'Pan-Indian' projects with a massive budget and dark, gritty tone.

posts.title: Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint: Part 2
posts.description: Following the 2025 release of Part 1, this sequel continues the story of a man whose favorite web novel comes to life, forcing him to use his knowledge to survive the apocalypse.

posts.title: Animal Park
posts.description: The sequel to the 2023 blockbuster 'Animal'. It promises a double role for Ranbir Kapoor and an even more violent and intense confrontation between his characters.

posts.title: Squid Game - Season 3
posts.description: The final conclusion to the Squid Game saga. After the fallout of Season 2, Seong Gi-hun faces the ultimate battle against the creators of the game.

posts.title: Ramayana: Part 2
posts.description: The second part of Nitesh Tiwari's epic retelling of the Indian myth. Expected to focus on the war between Rama and Ravana with cutting-edge visual effects.

posts.title: Borbaad
posts.description: A high-budget action spectacle starring Megastar Shakib Khan. The film is expected to set new benchmarks for Bangladeshi cinema visuals.

posts.title: Naruto - Season 1
posts.description: The journey of a young ninja who seeks recognition from his peers and dreams of becoming the Hokage, the leader of his village.

posts.title: Naruto Shippuden - Season 1
posts.description: After training with Jiraiya, Naruto returns to the Leaf Village to face the Akatsuki and save his friend Sasuke.

posts.title: Boruto: Two Blue Vortex
posts.description: Three years after the events of Next Generations, a matured Boruto returns to the village as a rogue ninja to face the threat of Jura.

posts.title: One Piece - Season 1
posts.description: Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew explore a world of endless oceans and islands in search of the world's ultimate treasure.

posts.title: Case Closed (Detective Conan) - Season 1
posts.description: A brilliant high school detective is transformed into a child by a mysterious organization and solves cases while searching for a cure.

posts.title: One Piece Film: Red
posts.description: The Straw Hats attend a concert by Uta, the world's most beloved singer and daughter of Red-Haired Shanks.

posts.title: One Piece: Stampede
posts.description: Pirates from around the world gather at the Pirates Expo to join a hunt for Gold Roger's lost treasure.

posts.title: The Million-dollar Pentagram
posts.description: A message arrives from Kaito Kid, announcing he will steal a Japanese sword belonging to the wealthy Onoe Family in Hakodate.

posts.title: Bleach: Hell Verse
posts.description: Hell is a place where those who committed severe crimes are sent. When a group of vicious Sinners escape, Ichigo must descend into the depths of Hell.

posts.title: The Day Naruto Became Hokage
posts.description: A special OVA included with the Boruto: Naruto the Movie home release, depicting the morning of Naruto's inauguration ceremony.

posts.title: One Piece: 3D2Y
posts.description: Luffy undergoes training with Rayleigh during the two-year timeskip and must protect Boa Hancock from a powerful new enemy.

posts.title: Episode One: The Great Detective Turned Small
posts.description: A complete remake of the first two episodes of the series, featuring new footage and perspectives on the day Shinichi Kudo became Conan.

posts.title: Bleach: Memories in the Rain
posts.description: An early OVA retelling the emotional story of Ichigo's mother and the Grand Fisher Hollow.

posts.title: The Last: Naruto the Movie
posts.description: Two years after the Fourth Shinobi World War, the moon is descending toward Earth. Naruto must stop Toneri Otsutsuki and save Hinata.

posts.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
posts.description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe.

posts.title: Dune: Part Two
posts.description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.

posts.title: Avatar: Fire and Ash
posts.description: In the wake of the devastating war against the RDA and the loss of their eldest son, Jake Sully and Neytiri face a new threat on Pandora: the Ash People, a violent and power-hungry Na'vi tribe led by the ruthless Varang. Jake's family must fight for their survival and the future of Pandora in a conflict that pushes them to their emotional and physical limits.

posts.title: Avatar
posts.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

posts.title: Avatar: The Way of Water
posts.description: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family formed on the extrasolar moon Pandora. Once a familiar threat returns to finish what was previously started, Jake must work with Neytiri and the army of the Na'vi race to protect their home.

posts.title: Avatar: The Tulkun Rider
posts.description: The fourth installment of the Avatar franchise. James Cameron has stated that the film will feature a significant time jump and continue the epic struggle for the future of Pandora.

posts.title: Avatar: The Quest for Eywa
posts.description: In the fifth film, the story is rumored to partially take place on Earth, showing Neytiri the reality of the dying world the RDA comes from while concluding the journey of the Sully family.

posts.title: Barbie
posts.description: Barbie and Ken are having the time of their lives in the colorful and seemingly perfect world of Barbie Land.

posts.title: Attack on Titan - Final Season
posts.description: Eren Yeager's ultimate plan comes to fruition as he begins his final assault on the source of all Titan power.
posts.japaneseTitle: Shingeki no Kyojin: The Final Season

posts.title: Demon Slayer - Season 1
posts.description: After a demon attack leaves his family dead and his sister transformed, Tanjiro Kamado joins the Demon Slayer Corps to find a cure and seek justice.

posts.title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
posts.description: Tanjiro and his companions join Kyojuro Rengoku, the Flame Hashira, to investigate a series of disappearances aboard a mysterious train.

posts.title: Demon Slayer - Entertainment District Arc
posts.description: Tanjiro and his comrades join the Sound Hashira, Tengen Uzui, on a mission to an entertainment district where demons are rumored to reside.

posts.title: Demon Slayer - Swordsmith Village Arc
posts.description: Tanjiro travels to the hidden Swordsmith Village to repair his sword. There, he encounters the Mist Hashira and the Love Hashira while facing an assault by high-ranking demons.
posts.japaneseTitle: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Katanakaji no Sato-hen

posts.title: Demon Slayer - Hashira Training Arc
posts.description: The Demon Slayer Corps undergoes a rigorous training regimen led by the Hashira to prepare for the final confrontation with Muzan Kibutsuji.

posts.title: Demon Slayer: Infinity Castle - Part 1
posts.description: The first film in the epic finale trilogy. The Demon Slayer Corps enters the Infinity Castle to face the remaining deadly Twelve Kizuki.

posts.title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
posts.description: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence.

posts.title: Oppenheimer
posts.description: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

posts.title: Frozen
posts.description: When the newly crowned Queen Elsa accidentally uses her power to turn things into ice to curse her home in infinite winter, her sister Anna teams up with a mountain man, his playful reindeer, and a snowman to change the weather condition.

posts.title: Frozen II
posts.description: Anna, Elsa, Kristoff, Olaf and Sven leave Arendelle to travel to an ancient, autumn-bound forest of an enchanted land. They set out to find the origin of Elsa's powers in order to save their kingdom.

posts.title: Squid Game - Season 1
posts.description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in children's games. Inside, a tempting prize awaits with deadly high stakes. A survival game that has the potential to change their lives forever.

posts.title: Squid Game - Season 2
posts.description: Gi-hun returns with a mission, abandoning his plans to go to the US after a mysterious call. He dives back into the deadly survival game to stop it once and for all.

posts.title: Kuruluş: Osman - Season 1
posts.description: The epic story of Osman Ghazi, the founder of the Ottoman Empire, as he fights internal and external enemies to establish a great nation.

posts.title: Hidden Love
posts.description: Sang Zhi falls in love with Duan Jia Xu, a boy who often comes to her house to play games with her older brother. A heartwarming story of a long-term crush blooming into love.

posts.title: Kajal Rekha
posts.description: Based on the 400-year-old folklore from Mymensingh Gitika, this musical drama follows the life and struggle of Kajal Rekha.

posts.title: Alice in Borderland - Season 1
posts.description: An obsessed gamer and his two friends find themselves in a deserted Tokyo, where they are forced to compete in a series of sadistic games to survive.

posts.title: Alice in Borderland - Season 2
posts.description: The games are deadlier, and the stakes are higher. Arisu and Usagi must collect the remaining face cards to uncover the truth behind the Borderland and return home.

posts.title: Alice in Borderland - Season 3
posts.description: The Joker card appeared at the end of season 2. Arisu and Usagi must face a new reality and even more dangerous games in this upcoming installment.

posts.title: Panchayat - Season 1
posts.description: Abhishek Tripathi, an engineering graduate, takes up a job as a secretary of a Panchayat office in a remote village named Phulera due to a lack of better job options.
posts.studio: The Viral Fever (TVF) / Amazon Prime Video

posts.title: Panchayat - Season 2
posts.description: As Abhishek settles into his life in Phulera, he begins to take an interest in village politics and development, all while dealing with the eccentricities of the villagers and his own career frustrations.
posts.studio: The Viral Fever (TVF) / Amazon Prime Video

posts.title: Panchayat - Season 3
posts.description: Abhishek continues his journey as the secretary of a remote village gram panchayat, navigating quirky rural politics and local rivalries.

posts.title: Frozen Fever
posts.description: On Anna's birthday, Elsa and Kristoff are determined to give her the best celebration ever, but Elsa's icy powers may put more than just the party at risk.

posts.title: Olaf's Frozen Adventure
posts.description: Olaf teams up with Sven on a merry mission to find the best holiday tradition for Anna and Elsa, who realize they have no family traditions of their own.

posts.title: Once Upon a Snowman
posts.description: The previously untold origins of Olaf, the innocent and insightful, summer-loving snowman are revealed as we follow his first steps as he comes to life.

posts.title: Sisu: Road to Revenge
posts.description: The legendary Finnish commando Aatami Korpi returns in this high-octane sequel, continuing his brutal journey of survival and vengeance against those who dare cross his path.

posts.title: Now You See Me: Now You Don't
posts.description: The Four Horsemen return for a new mind-bending heist, introducing a new generation of illusionists while uncovering a conspiracy that dates back to the origins of The Eye.

posts.title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery
posts.description: Benoit Blanc returns to solve his most dangerous case yet in this third installment of the celebrated whodunnit franchise.

posts.title: IT: Welcome to Derry
posts.description: Set in the 1960s, this prequel series explores the origins of Pennywise the Dancing Clown and the history of the curse that haunts the town of Derry.

posts.title: Zootopia
posts.description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

posts.title: Zootopia 2
posts.description: Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde return for a new adventure in the urban jungle of Zootopia, facing a case that leads them to a new part of the animal kingdom.

posts.title: Soldier
posts.description: Shakib Khan's upcoming film where he plays the role of an Army personnel.

posts.title: Disclosure Day
posts.description: A high-stakes political thriller centered around the global fallout following the official confirmation of extraterrestrial intelligence.

posts.title: Dimlight
posts.description: Plot unknown. Rumored to be a love story set in Bangladesh.

posts.title: Chainsaw Man - The Movie: Reze Arc
posts.description: In a brutal war between devils, hunters, and secret enemies, a mysterious girl named Reze has stepped into Denji's world, and he faces his deadliest battle yet, fueled by love in a world where survival knows no rules.
